title: ChronoVoyage
prompt: Create a single HTML file for a time-travel tourism agency called "ChronoVoyage". Make it creative and fun with CSS animations. Include: a hero section with a catchy tagline, 3-4 destination time periods to visit (e.g., Ancient Rome, Roaring 20s, Year 3000), pricing tiers, and a booking CTA. All in one self-contained index.html with inline CSS/JS.
